items.title: Air quality tests around xAI’s Memphis data center raise questions
items.description: A legal group is questioning why a key pollutant was omitted from air quality tests near xAI's data center

items.title: Creative Commons debuts CC signals, a framework for an open AI ecosystem
items.description: The idea is meant to create a balance between the open nature of the internet and the demand for ever more data to fuel AI.

items.title: Meta is adding AI-powered summaries to WhatsApp
items.description: Meta announced on Wednesday that it’s adding an AI-powered summaries feature to WhatsApp. The optional new feature uses Meta AI to summarize unread me...

items.title: Rubrik acquires Predibase to accelerate adoption of AI agents
items.description: Predibase helps companies train and fine-tune open source AI models which will help Rubrik customers deploy AI agents faster.

items.title: AI Agents Are Getting Better at Writing Code—and Hacking It as Well
items.description: One of the best bug-hunters in the world is an AI tool called Xbow, just one of many signs of the coming age of cybersecurity automation.
